name: SNOOZE OR LOSE
description:
Try to finish your dream before you wake up and travel through a surreal dreamworld! The closer you are to the final Alarm Clock in real life, the more your dream world falls apart, meaning the level gets harder. Once you fail in your dream, you wake up in real life.

Genre:   3D Platformer 

Camera:   Third Person

Audience:   Platformer Fans

Platform:   PC

Controls:  PS4 Controller, Keyboard

Artstyle:   Stylized

Technology:   Unity

This Prototype was made for a game design contest, based on the experience of my morning routine.
